tool_description:
A simple API to check text content for spam. This API performs a wide range of advanced tests on the email content, based on machine learning trained on over 100k+ emails that were labeled by hand.

It will work with any text, such as comments, e-mail, html or plain text messages. The API will return a classification of spam/not spam, as well as a spam score between 0 and 1 if you want do your own classification,
title: Spam Check

api_list.name: Spam Check
api_list.description: Use this endpoint to check any text content for spam. Pass the text to be check in the text query string when making the request.
